title: Sara's Shame
description: Adrianne is a high profile classical singing star so decides to travel to Sheriton in disguise as Julia Dawson. Robert Kingsley is the man of her dreams - he falls head over heals in love with Julia, but has a hard time accepting her as Adrianne. Can she solve the secret of Sara's Shame - can she reunite the family that the terrible secret had torn assunder.
author: Susan Elle
